attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: i downloaded this app in attempts to see what president trump had to offer because i wasn’t 100% set on who to vote in this years election. i was instead met with very little talking points that seemed interesting or even remotely beneficial. also the fact that he is trying to silence the people via deleting and banning apps that will go unnamed, is disgusting and truly shows how insecure he is as a person and his presidency. he truly is turning america slowly into a fascist country. i can’t see the appeal of him to anyone that isn’t a straight white cisgendered male.

attributes.title: Worst app in the creation of all apps
attributes.review: Why did anyone even make this. The president won’t make America great again. He will ruin it. It will burn to the ground and he will be there on top watching everyone burn. If you support this human being then I’m sorry but you’re the worst. Right next to him. Make America great again by not supporting him

attributes.title: Not mad just disappointed
attributes.review: I am fully astonished ASSTONISHED how you the AppStore can let this horrid app be given to the people. I would rate it a -5 OUT OF 5 if I could but I can’t. The app system is really racist and everytime I use it my skin gets orange my eyes go blind. Definitely would not recommend this app to anyone with a functioning brain.

attributes.title: Somebody🤫
attributes.review: This is such a bad app when I got it I thought I was gonna vote for him but when I tried it didn’t let me and my phone started to glitch a lot and it wasn’t letting me go into other apps. It was just bad🤦🏽‍♀️ and while I’m typing this is glitching but I could still type little by little😒

attributes.title: Honestly, this app is trash.
attributes.review: I got the app because I was curious, did i regret it? YES. It didn’t even function correctly, I tried to open it and then poof, it crashed. I tried this multiple times and it ended with the same result, crashing. What I’m trying to say here is that: You really shouldn’t download this.

attributes.title: Revolting//made me lose my socks
attributes.review: I cannot fathom how this app is allowed. The sheer quality makes me want to barf. It’s so slow and drains my phone battery. A complete waste of time. I regret downloading. Also- as soon as I downloaded this app, I lost my socks. Personally I think it’s related. If you want to keep your socks- delete this app!!!!!!

attributes.title: WITCHCRAFT!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to stay updated with the president but it has caused demons to enter my home! as soon as i downloaded this app a cockroach started crawling over to me and i slapped it and then i turned into a snake! then my 15 year old daughter left to live with her 19 year old boy friend. THIS APP IS WITCH CRAFT! don’t download. i am no longer supporting trump. #settleforbiden😌

attributes.title: This app almost made my entire iphone x combust
attributes.review: I loooooveee trumpy wumpy bc I was told he will made America good, but his app is a no no. When I opened it, my grandma promptly died on the spot, and my phone exploded in a matter of seconds. Luckily, my phone got repaired and can now work, but my grandma cannot and that is why I will never open this app again. USE WITH CAUTION

attributes.title: caused a seizure, i’m thinking of suing
attributes.review: i’m a DISGUSTED of this app. my mom had a seizure due to the incorruptible flashes of lights coming from the app. one morning she wanted to check up on the Trump 2020 App to see the latest events that came up, but then out of no where flashes of lights sprung from the app and it caused her to die of a seizure. watch your backs i might just sue.

attributes.title: Don’t down load it
attributes.review: Horrible this app is horribleeeeeeeereee I hate itttty it’s not that good I down loaded it thinking it was good but when I found all the reviews I saw that the app had mostly bad reviews and it took very very very very long to down load so if you don’t want to waste you time please don’t download it
